<%= form_for @contact do |f| %>
<%= f.label :name %> <%= f.text_field :name, required: true, class: "form-control", id: "name", placeholder: "Name" %>

<%= f.label :message %> <%= f.text_area :message, as: :text, class: "form-control", id: "message", placeholder:"Message" %>
<%= f.label :nickname %> <%= f.text_field :nickname, hint: 'leave this field blank', class: "hidden" %>
<%= f.submit "Send", class: "contact-send" %>
<% end %>
